txt.en: You have slain many wood-flies and reduced the threat they posed to the Entwash and nearby trees.

As Quickbeam's Huorn marches about above the Entwash's banks, you notice it begin to swat its branches at the nearby wood-flies, narrowly missing your head in the process. In the absence of the Ents and most other Huorns, it is clear that these disease-laden flies have grown unchecked and wild.\n\nYou should aid the Huorn in culling their numbers.

Quickbeam's Huorn seems pleased that you have made an effort to rid the forest of disease-laden wood-flies. You slew many of their number, and judging by numerous crushed wings stuck to the Huorn's branches, so did it.
Wood-flies can be found throughout Fangorn Forest to the west of Derndingle.\n\nThe Huorn seeks your aid in thinning the number of wood-flies in Fangorn Forest. You should defeat them.
In the absence of the Ents, wood-flies have spread out of control and threaten to overwhelm the forest.
